title: Until Dawn Suffers a Rough Launch - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.08.24
description:
Pre-order New World: Aeternum now on PlayStation 5 or Xbox Series X|S to get the Azoth Stalker Wolf Mount and prepare for launch on October 15! https://bit.ly/3XROcCT 

Until Dawn suffers a rough launch, Red Dead Redemption FINALLY comes to PC, and Little Big Planet 3 gets delisted.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
 - GAMESCAST - Dragon Ball Sparking Zero Review
 - The STREAM is Diablo 4 Vessel of Hatred
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
 - You can get today’s Gregway

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
             -  The Roper Report   -
00:08:37 - Until Dawn PS5 and PC Remake Suffers a Rough Launch
00:32:41 - Red Dead Redemption Finally Has a PC Release Date
00:37:31 - LittleBigPlanet 3 is being delisted from the PlayStation Store
00:41:46 - We have the final ruling in Epic v. Google
00:48:41 - Wee News!
00:53:27 - SuperChats
00:56:22 - You‘re Wrong
